cleaned_text: Energy Boost Essential Oils Giftset - - - CITRUS BOOST BLEND: Citrus aurantium bergamia (bergamot) fruit oil, citrus paradisi (grapefruit) peel oil, citrus limon (lemon) peel oil, citrus nobilis (mandarin orange) peel oil, citrus aurantium dulcis (orange) peel oil, citrus tangerina (tangerine) oil. EUCALYPTUS: Steam distilled Eucalyptus globulus leaf oil. LEMON: Cold pressed Citrus limon (lemon) peel oil. - All-natural essential oils are free of harsh chemicals. - Airome Essential oils are certified 100% pure, therapeutic grade. Lab Test Guaranteed Pure. Each essential oil GC/MS tested. - Oils can be diffused using your favorite Airome Diffuser. - Have a spa-like aromatherapy experience in your own home. Enjoy a boost of energy and invigoration with these oils. Each has been selected for its vibrant fragrance and aromatherapy properties. Use as individual oils or blend together for a variety of benefits. Set includes Citrus Boost Essential Oil Blend, Eucalyptus Essential Oil, and Lemon Essential Oil in a gift box. CITRUS BOOST BLEND: An energizing blend with the many benefits of citrus oils. Diffuse it to boost energy, ease stress, and uplift mood. Ingredients: Citrus aurantium bergamia (bergamot) fruit oil, citrus paradisi (grapefruit) peel oil, citrus limon (lemon) peel oil, citrus nobilis (mandarin orange) peel oil, citrus aurantium dulcis (orange) peel oil, citrus tangerina (tangerine) oil. EUCALYPTUS: An invigorating, refreshing aroma. Diffuse it seasonally to encourage deep breathing and relaxation. Steam distilled Eucalyptus globulus leaf oil. LEMON: A cleansing, zesty aroma. Diffuse it to boost focus and energy and to freshen the air. Cold pressed Citrus limon (lemon) peel oil.
